caption: This song is a happy Punjabi song. The tempo is fast with a male vocalist singing an enthusiastic melody to the beat of a dhol , tanpura and beat of a shaker. The song is lively, simple, energetic and festive. This song is sung at weddings. It is a jugalbandi between the bride and groom’s side where two vocalists compete playful in vocal battle.
